feature_model.name: Aircraft PL

meta.data: A feature model of a simple aircraft product line
Markus Voelter, Using Domain-Specific Languages for Product Line Engineering, Tutorial at SPLC 2009, San Francisco, USA

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Aircraft(_id_0) :m Wing(_id_1) :g (_id_2) [1,*] : High(_id_3) : Shoulder(_id_4) : Low(_id_5) :o Engine(_id_6) :g (_id_7) [1,1] : Jet(_id_8) : Piston(_id_9) :m Materials(_id_10) :g (_id_11) [1,*] : Metal(_id_12) : Wood(_id_13) : Cloth(_id_14) : Plastic(_id_15)
